name: Flago
description:
(Please be patient. Jam games aren't quite optimized)

Grab the crystal, escape your enemy and take the crystal to your base to claim the planet for your race.

This game was made in 48h for the CampJam2016 under the theme "Astronauts & Unicorns".

Art and animation were woven by Pedro de Almeida, Elias Velho e Breno Bretas. Dynamic soundtrack was fully created by Bruno Gazoni. Ideas were had with Guilherme Pradulla.

CONTROLS:

Player 1:

A, D to move; W to jump; Space bar to attack

Player 2:

Left and right arrows to move; Up arrow to jump; Right Ctrl to attack
